title: ADDIE Model-Based Instructional Design for Self-Directed Newborn Care Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Pregnancy and Childbirth Processes
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance pre-service/in-service teachers' practical skills for newborn care and instructional design capabilities

learning_goals: Identify five risk signals in newborn care and explain appropriate response strategies
Analyze practical breastfeeding technique applications and propose effective problem-solving strategies
Design newborn care education programs following ADDIE model phases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
